org.gearvrf

Class GVRMaterialShaderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRBaseShaderManager<GVRMaterialMap,GVRCustomMaterialShaderId>
        • org.gearvrf.GVRMaterialShaderManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, GVRShaderManagers<GVRMaterialMap,GVRCustomMaterialShaderId>

    public class GVRMaterialShaderManager
extends GVRBaseShaderManager<GVRMaterialMap,GVRCustomMaterialShaderId>
implements GVRShaderManagers<GVRMaterialMap,GVRCustomMaterialShaderId>
    Manages custom shaders, for rendering scene objects. Get the singleton from GVRContext.getMaterialShaderManager().

    • Method Summary

      Builds a shader program from the supplied vertex and fragment shader code.

    • Method Detail

      • addShader

        public GVRCustomMaterialShaderId addShader(java.lang.String vertexShader,
                                           java.lang.String fragmentShader)
        Description copied from interface: GVRShaderManagers
        Builds a shader program from the supplied vertex and fragment shader code.
        Specified by:
        addShader in interface GVRShaderManagers<GVRMaterialMap,GVRCustomMaterialShaderId>
        Parameters:
        vertexShader - GLSL source code for a vertex shader.
        fragmentShader - GLSL source code for a fragment shader.
        Returns:
        An opaque type that you can pass to getShaderMap(ID), or to the GVRMaterial and GVRPostEffect constructors and setShader methods.
